# Download package "quantmod" for get daily stock price
# Download package "xlsx" for Read and Write xlsx file
```{r}
install.packages("quantmod")
install.packages("xlsx")
```

# import library "quantmod" for use in project
```{r}
library(quantmod)
library("xlsx")
```

#Get AMZN stock price [date 2013-02-14 to 2016-09-17]
```{r}
getSymbols("brk-a", from = "2013-02-14", to = "2016-09-17", periodicity = "daily")
```

#Select only close price
```{r}
brka_ClosePrice <- Cl(`BRK-A`)
```

#Select only date focus
```{r}
brka_focus_price <- brka_ClosePrice[date_focus]
```


Creat excel file
```{r}
#write.zoo(apple_Daily_ClosePrice, file = "Apple_Daily_Price", sep = ",")
```

```{r}
write.xlsx(brka_focus_price, file="Brk-a_Daily_Price_focus.xlsx", sheetName="Sheet1", 
  col.names=TRUE, row.names=TRUE, append=FALSE)
```

#remove all variable
```{r}
rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))
```
